Comment:
please note that i will use these abbreviations : N = knight, B = bishop, o-o or o-o-o = castling, K = king, Q = queen,              R = rock, !! = very good move, ! = good move, ?? = very bad move, ? = bad move, !? = may be good, may be bad.
1. d4
to be in the center.
to get black out of the center.
to enforce the center pawn and to open the way for the bishop, but closing the way of the other B. preparing to pin the N. !?
to develop and pin the knight.
to be ready for the coming battle.
developing the knight and preparing to jump to e5 in the near future.
to prevent the knight from coming to g4.
hoping to advance to e4 to fork (B and N) or Nxe5.
